pages.text: While active, the $(item)Sigil of Compression$() will attempt to compress items such as dust, ingots, or gems into their storage block variants once a full stack has been gathered.$(br2)A stack of 63 $(item)Redstone Dust$() will remain untouched, but a stack of 64 will compress 9 dust into a $(item)Block of Redstone$().$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() $(blood)200 LP$()/5 sec
